location.sjis: ディックル村 住宅地

dialogue.sjis: 親方にケガさせたあの召喚獣を 追いかけなきゃ！
dialogue.ascii: I gotta follow that Summon Beast that injured Master!

male.sjis: 村の外に出るんなら 武器を準備してからだな 材料もそろったし、工房に行こう
male.ascii: I need a weapon if I'm going to leave the village. I have the materials, I just need to craft it.

female.sjis: 村の外に出るんなら 武器を準備してからだね 材料もそろったし、工房に行こう
female.ascii: I need a weapon if I'm going to leave the village. I have the materials, I just need to craft it.

dialogue.sjis: もう二度とワガハイを ネコ呼ばわりはさせぬからな！
dialogue.ascii: I won't let you call me a cat ever again!
Fine, I'll end you if you insist.

dialogue.sjis: これでよかったのかしら
ふたりとも勝負だなんて
dialogue.ascii: You two fighting I don't like this

dialogue.sjis: ふたりとも勝負だなんて
dialogue.ascii: You two fighting I don't like this

dialogue.sjis: ふたりとも勝負だなんて
dialogue.ascii: You two fighting I don't like this

dialogue.sjis: 近頃の若いヤツはなっとらん 召喚師もそうじゃ、 召喚したらしたで用が済んだら
dialogue.ascii: Young'uns these days are too lax! Summoners too! Had they just send back their Beasts immediately

dialogue.sjis: 責任を持って送還すれば はぐれ召喚獣なんて 問題は、おこらん
dialogue.ascii: Then we wouldn't have the hassle of dealing with so many Strays roaming about in the first place!

dialogue.sjis: 近頃、物騒ですねぇ わたしがこの村に 嫁いでから、うん十年
dialogue.ascii: It's been really dangerous lately I've lived here for decades

dialogue.sjis: こんなに、はぐれが 暴れる事は、初めてです
dialogue.ascii: But this is the first time I have seen Strays this berserk.
